column2: "Great work! Now that those guys are out of the way, I think people are starting to breathe a bit easier."
"Huh? You came up with an idea for how to cure people's tiredness? Tell me, tell me!"
"M-hmm, so you say eating a delicious meal together will remind people that we're all one big community working towards the same goals? That's a great idea!"
"Thanks a ton! Your idea is going to be really, really useful! I hope you'll be able to help me with a few other things, too!"
